Helix.text:
WHAT: Figure's humanoid robot designed for logistics.
CATEGORY: Humanoid robotics.
FEATURES: Vision-language-action model, real-world logistics applications.
CAPABILITIES: Humanoid walking, object manipulation, autonomous navigation.
USERS: Companies in logistics, manufacturing, and robotics.
MARKETS: Global, focusing on industrial applications.

company.text:

POSITIONING: Leader in AI-driven robotics and humanoid development
COMPLIANCE: Not explicitly mentioned

NOTE: Figure is the sole owner and developer of Helix.
